name: Eazao Zero
pre_gcode:
G21 
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
G28 ;Home 
G1 Z15.0 F1500 ;move the platform down 15mm
G92 E0 
G1 F300 E10
G92 E0
M302
M163 S0 P0.9; Set Mix Factor
M163 S1 P0.1; Set Mix Factor
M164 S0
post_gcode:
G92 E10
G1 E-10 F300
G28 X0 Y0 ;move X Y to min endstops
M82
M84 ;steppers off
